Define Values: Clearly define the values of ownership, systems thinking, and customer focus. Develop specific, measurable, and actionable behaviors associated with each value.

Leadership Training: Provide leadership training programs focused on unity of purpose, consistent vision, and clarity of intent. Ensure leaders understand how these principles align with the desired cultural values.

Maslow’s Integration: Integrate Maslow’s Hierarchy by creating programs that address employees' basic needs (security, belonging) as well as higher-order needs (recognition, personal growth).
